data.Name: Energy Renaissance
data.About: Energy Renaissance designs, manufactures and sells lithium-ion battery (‘LiB’) storage products optimised for hot climates using proven industry-leading technology and home grown IP. Production will take place in an advanced manufacturing facility committed to Australian resources that will include a specialised R&D facility focused on growing and promoting Australian talent. Our LiB modules are engineered and designed for safety, cost and heat management for Microgrid, Special Purpose Electric Vehicle and residential applications.
